sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Notes from './Notes' import categoryContext from '../../contexts/CategoryContext' const CategoryItem = (props) => { const category = props.category const obj = useContext(categoryContext) const {deleteCategory,updateCategory}=obj return ( <>
{`#${category.id} :- ${category.name}`} { deleteCategory(category.id) }} style={{ height: '30px', width: '30px', cursor: 'pointer' }} alt="Delete" /> { updateCategory(category.id) }} style={{ height: '30px', width: '30px', cursor: 'pointer' }} alt="Delete" />
) } export default CategoryItem
